definitions.definition: A work, such as a work of fiction, published in installments, often numbered and without a specified end.
A publication issued in successive parts, often numbered and with no predetermined end.
A serial number, esp. one required to activate software.
definitions.example: Go to these sites for serials, cracks and keygens.

definitions.definition: To assign a serial number to (especially of aircraft)
Having to do with or arranged in a series.
definitions.example: He was a serial entrepreneur, always coming up with a new way to make cash.
